properties.areaDesc: Chinati Mountains; Davis Mountains; Marfa Plateau; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 4 at 2:58AM CST until February 5 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6
inches.

* WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, Van Horn and Highway
54 Corridor, Chinati, Marfa Plateau, and Davis Mountains.

* WHEN...From 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to 6 PM CST /5 PM
MST/ Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by
calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be
obtained by calling 800-452-9292.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ WEDNESDAY
